Capital Chamber Choir

Magnificat

On Saturday, December 12, 2010, the Capital Chamber Choir presented Imant Raminsh’s Magnificat with renowned mezzo-soprano Sandra Graham. Many thanks to all who helped make this evening of great music a success! Click here for a complete programme.
